mapper.sql: id, stu_id, reasion, remark, apply_time, audit_time, status, audit_opinion, target_room,audit_man
mapper.select:
select c.id, c.stu_id, c.reasion, c.remark, c.apply_time, c.audit_time, c.status, c.audit_opinion, c.target_room,c.audit_man, u.name,u.stu_class,u.stu_no, r.room_sn from tab_change_room c,tab_user u,tab_room r where c.stu_id = u.user_id and u.room_id = r.room_id
and status like CONCAT('%',#{status},'%')
order by id desc
mapper.insert:
insert into tab_change_room
id,
stu_id,
reasion,
remark,
apply_time,
audit_time,
status,
audit_opinion,
target_room,
audit_man,
#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{stuId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{reasion,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{applyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{auditTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{auditOpinion,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{targetRoom,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
auditMan,
mapper.update:
update tab_change_room
stu_id = #{stuId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
reasion = #{reasion,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
apply_time = #{applyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
audit_time = #{auditTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
status = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
audit_opinion = #{auditOpinion,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
target_room = #{targetRoom,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
audit_man = #{auditMan,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update tab_change_room set stu_id = #{stuId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, reasion = #{reasion,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, apply_time = #{applyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, audit_time = #{auditTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, status = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, audit_opinion = #{auditOpinion,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, target_room = #{targetRoom,jdbcType=VARCHAR} audit_man=#{auditMan} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
